title: Solomonâ€™s Achievements
summary: Solomon completes temple-related projects, builds cities, and establishes administrative control. He ensures the temple service runs properly and keeps the annual religious festivals.

faq.question: What did Solomon build besides the temple?
faq.answer: Cities, storehouses, and fortifications throughout his kingdom.

faq.question: How did Solomon support worship?
faq.answer: He organized priests, Levites, and gatekeepers according to the law of Moses.
